io.confluent.ksql.execution.streams

Interface RoutingFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActiveHostFilter, LivenessFilter, MaximumLagFilter, RoutingFilters

    public interface RoutingFilter
    Used to filter ksql hosts based on criteria specified in implementing classes. One such example is a filter that checks whether hosts are alive or dead as determined by the heartbeat agent.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  RoutingFilter.Host 
      static interface  RoutingFilter.RoutingFilterFactory
      A factory for RoutingFilters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RoutingFilter.Host filter(KsqlHostInfo hostInfo)
      If the given host should be included for consideration.

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        RoutingFilter.Host filter(KsqlHostInfo hostInfo)
        If the given host should be included for consideration.
        Parameters:
        hostInfo - The host to be considered for this filter
        Returns:
        If the host should be included for consideration.
